note:
Bird bird bird, bird is the word.

36 year old Indian/South Asian person living in Mumbai. Have no expectations from my account. Sometimes I won't post for weeks, and then suddenly post a bunch, most of which will be nonsense.

Feel free to follow me if you want for whatever reason.Though I'll probably block you if you turn out to be too much trouble.
